meta.name: title
meta.content: Avalon Santa Monica on Main - Apartments in Santa Monica, CA | AvalonBay Communities

div.span: We believe elevating where you live is about blending it seamlessly with how you live. We go to great lengths designing amenities and choosing locations that put everything within reach. Where you live, is where you come alive. Unearth this lovely Avalon Santa Monica on Main community right next to the sunny beaches of Southern California. You will find beautiful one- and two-bedroom Santa Monica apartments that offer world class features like large walk-in closets, gourmet kitchens, skylights, private decks and rooftop gardens. Plus, our technology package, AvalonConnect, offers high-speed and common area WiFi, digital resident services including the ability to submit service requests and pay your rent online, package service, and more. With our Furnished+ program, apartment living is easier than ever before. Appreciate the stylish furnishings and enjoy the convenience of pre-installed Wi-Fi and cable TV, flexible lease-terms, and utilities that are included in your rent. With Furnished+, you can step right into the life you want to live, without all the hassle. You will also have access to a sparkling pool, a fitness center, a media lounge and various other facilities within the community itself. Check out the near-by restaurants, the famous Santa Monica Pier and the Third Street Promenade, where you can shop, eat or watch a movie. There is never a dull moment with the wide selection of attractions available in Los Angeles. This is not just apartment living. This is living up.

div.h2: The service. The standards. The life.

a.div: Great service is one of the things we think about most. We start with selecting passionate people. Then we let them put that passion to work. Our people are a vital part of what shapes the character of each Avalon community.

We strive to align our standards with yours, delivering an experience that lives up to them. We know you've put a lot into getting to where you are in life. We believe where you live should reflect that. So we put ourselves into making sure it does.

Effortless. Enjoyable. Truly comfortable living is both. That's why we go out of our way to choose locations and to design amenities that put so much within reach. So you can live easy without even trying.

div.div: Room dimensions, square footage, and features shown on the floor plan drawings are approximate and may vary between individual apartments that have similar layouts. Furniture shown on the floor plan drawings is representative and individual apartments come unfurnished unless specified otherwise. Quoted rent is per month for new move-ins to the community, based on the move-in date selected. Pricing may vary based on lease term. Quoted rent does not including other fees and charges that may be part of your lease (i.e. utilities, parking, etc.). Please contact the community for details. Prior to signing a lease, quoted rent, specials, availability, and other terms and conditions are subject to change without notice. Washington State - We require our own screening and do not accept comprehensive reusable tenant screening reports.

div.h2: Only the best for your best life

div.class: ant-typography feature-card-desc font-default text-center font-weight-normal text-center

a.div: Affordable homes for rent available through the affordable housing program for qualifying future residents.

div.class: ant-typography feature-card-desc font-default text-center font-weight-normal text-center

a.div: Homes fully furnished and connected to give you the lifestyle you deserve. Flexible lease terms for the ultimate convenience.

div.class: ant-typography feature-card-desc font-default text-center font-weight-normal text-center

a.div: Signature Collection homes are where our unique designs and top features come together.

div.class: ant-typography feature-card-desc font-default text-center font-weight-normal text-center

a.div: See what we do to take pet friendly living to the next level.

div.class: ant-typography feature-card-desc font-default text-center font-weight-normal text-center

a.div: Our technology package gives you ease of access and can allow you to save on monthly expenses.

div.class: ant-typography feature-card-desc font-default text-center font-weight-normal text-center

a.div: Start earning points on rent with our free residents reward program. Use your points for travel, future rent credit, fitness classes, and more.

div.class: ant-typography feature-card-desc font-default text-center font-weight-normal text-center

a.div: From fitness amenities to resident perks, we offer a variety of spaces and places to help you meet your wellness goals.

div.class: ant-typography feature-card-desc font-default text-center font-weight-normal text-center

a.div: Pay rent, submit a service request, find policies and more with our convenient online resident portal.

div.class: ant-typography feature-card-desc font-default text-center font-weight-normal text-center

a.div: Offering a wealth of resident resources, our Relocation Advantage program assists in making your transition a smooth one.

We go to great lengths designing amenities and choosing locations that put everything within reach. Where you live, is where you come alive. Unearth this lovely Avalon Santa Monica on Main community right next to the sunny beaches of Southern California. You will find beautiful one- and two-bedroom Santa Monica apartments that offer world class features like large walk-in closets, gourmet kitchens, skylights, private decks and rooftop gardens. Plus, our technology package, AvalonConnect, offers high-speed and common area WiFi, digital resident services including the ability to submit service requests and pay your rent online, package service, and more. With our Furnished+ program, apartment living is easier than ever before. Appreciate the stylish furnishings and enjoy the convenience of pre-installed Wi-Fi and cable TV, flexible lease-terms, and utilities that are included in your rent. With Furnished+, you can step right into the life you want to live, without all the hassle. You will also have access to a sparkling pool, a fitness center, a media lounge and various other facilities within the community itself. Check out the near-by restaurants, the famous Santa Monica Pier and the Third Street Promenade, where you can shop, eat or watch a movie. There is never a dull moment with the wide selection of attractions available in Los Angeles. This is not just apartment living.
